event.text: TEST TEST .

event.name: AEA_OLD_POWER_CELL_GET
event.text: There's a strange wreck at this beacon, almost none of it is salvagable. You only manage to recover a single strange weapon from the wreckage.

event.name: AEA_POWER_CELL_SPEAK
event.text: YOU SHOULD NOT BE SEEING THIS, IF YOU ARE CHECK TO MAKE SURE YOUR HYPERSPACE IS UP TO DATE.

event.name: AEA_OLD_GATE

beaconType.unvisitedTooltip: This is the location of a large structure.
beaconType.visitedTooltip: This is the location of a large structure.

event.text: A massive ring sits in orbit nearby the beacon, an imposing structure with no apparent use. Apparently having been put here long ago, the use of the ring remains a mystery to this day.
The strange weapon you collected earlier in your travels begins to glow as you near the structure.

choice.text: (??? Weapon) Insert the weapon into the gate.

event.name: AEA_GATE_NAME_SET
event.text: The gate begins to glow, your sensors light up and detect a massive discharge of energy directed at the centre of the gate.
The weapon you put into the gate is spat out once again, it appears to have pulled part of the gate out with it.

event.name: AEA_OLD_GATE_SPEAK
event.text: YOU SHOULD NOT BE SEEING THIS, IF YOU ARE CHECK TO MAKE SURE YOUR HYPERSPACE IS UP TO DATE.
You admire the structure while your FTL drive changes.
You admire the structure while your FTL drive changes.

event.name: AEA_OLD_GATE_WARP
event.text: [MESSAGE FROM THE DEVS] The main story beyond this point is currently being rewritten. However most of those changes will not be in yet, keep an eye out for updates in the future.. If you do see any bugs it's still worth reporting them.

triggeredEventBox.tooltip: The Mysterious Cruiser is charging its MV drive. It's artillery appear to be a strange weapon which grab hold of your ship and tethers you to them. You'll probably be pulled away with them if they go into hyperspace...

destroyed.text:
You've destroyed the Mysterious cruiser, you begin salvaging the vessel.
You wonder if perhaps something would have happened if you let it escape and take you with it.

event.name: ESCAPE_AEA_OLD_GUARD_BOSS
event.text:
Surprisingly it appears the cruiser is trying to run away, if you're not careful you might get pulled away with it.
It's artillery appear to be some kind of hooks which grab hold of your ship and tether you to them. You'll probably be pulled away with them if they go into hyperspace...

event.name: GOTAWAY_AEA_OLD_GUARD_BOSS
event.text: The ship's jump drive initiates and pulls it away.
Almost in the same instance you're pulled off your feet when the ship is ripped into Hyperspeed with the cruiser.

event.name: AEA_OLD_GATE_GUARD_BOSS_ACTIVATE
event.text: It appears that whatever you've done has pissed the ship off enough to activate the rest of it's weapons.

event.name: AEA_OLD_BEAM_MASTER
event.text: "I've finally figured it out, the reason why I kept losing is because you keep shooting at my ship! First I thought - 'Well, why don't I take away their guns?', but my crew told me it's not really feasible, so I though about what you usually shoot and Eureka! You aim for my systems, don't you? You sneaky bastard, the secret is out! And now - no more. These cool lylmik dudes sold me this armour stuff and I basically ripped them off, just cost me all my other guns, but now I am practically become invincible. Now I am the ARMOUR MASTER! Good luck hitting anything, beyatch!"

choice.text: (Powerful Beam) Show the Beam to Leah.

textList.name: TEXT_DESTROYED_AEA_OLD_MV
textList.text: The wreck breaks apart into thousands of pieces of scrap metal, Unfortunately not all of those are actually useful bits of scrap.
As the ship breaks apart you wonder how long it will take another ship of the same kind to be pulled into this segment of the multiverse.

The ship foundries in Lylmik space simply aren't as capable as the ones with access to the rest of the multiverse, and as a result you're unlikely to see another ship like the one that just blew up soon.
Another powerful foe felled. It hasn't really gotten you much closer to escaping, but you did get some scrap out of it.

event.name: DESTROYED_AEA_OLD_MV_GUN
event.text: To your surprise, a weapon managed to survive the explosion. It's a little crisp from the explosion but with a few touch ups you can salvage it.

textList.name: TEXT_DEAD_CREW_AEA_OLD_MV
textList.text: With advanced ships like these in short supply, it probably won't take long for this one to be recovered by some other Unfortunate souls.
With the crew but a red smear on the walls of the ship, you're able to scrap the ship in peace.
Only the most dangerous ships survive out here. Unfortunately for the crew of this ship you're the most dangerous around.

event.name: DEAD_CREW_AEA_OLD_MV_GUN
event.text: Now emptied of crew, you find one of their weapons on board. You take it back with you before scrapping the ship.

destroyed.text: With the ship destroyed you're able to scrap it for a decent reward.

deadCrew.text: With the ship cleared of crew you're able to scrap it for a decent reward.

destroyed.text: With the ship destroyed you're able to scrap it for a decent reward.

deadCrew.text: With the ship cleared of crew you're able to scrap it for a decent reward.

event.name: TRANSPORT_AEA_OLD_1_LOOT

beaconType.visitedTooltip: Explored location. Nothing left of interest.

event.text: This beacon hosts Lylmik station. It's safe to bet the station is most likely carrying some special tech. If you can kill the crew onboard, the cargo will be yours.

choice.text: Demand the surrender of the goods.

event.text: You prepare to secure the cargo by force.
You stay outside of the station's range and prepare to jump away.

event.name: TRANSPORT_CAPTURE_AEA_OLD
event.text: The crew is dead, leaving you with the station. Its cargo is yours for the taking. Aboard is the special tech you expected, which you bring back to your ship.

textList.name: TEXT_DESTROYED_AEA_OLD
textList.text: The Lylmik ship explodes into many smaller pieces, you can make out chunks of armour, still whole even after being exploded. It's oddly satisfying, and you reflect fondly on your handiwork as you scrap the remains.
You wonder how you never heard about the Lylmiks before, but then you remember the whole being kidnapped thing.
With every Lilmik ship destroyed you're one step closer to escaping their quarantine, it isn't a lot but it's enough to keep you going.

textList.name: TEXT_DEAD_CREW_AEA_OLD
textList.text: As the last Lylmik collapses, it lets out two last words. "Screw... you..."
You've made quick work of these aliens. You don't feel any guilt, afterall these aren't really murders anyway.
You've heard that instead of dying the Lylmik just get redirected to a new body, better hope those new bodies aren't anywhere nearby.
You may not feel bad about the lylmik, but their organic crew may not always deserve it.

event.text: "Good, I see you are smarter than most. Be grateful that we too have decided to show you mercy."
"Really? You dare try to try and fight us again? Hah, how laughable."

surrender.text: "Mortal beings, you must not be aware of the consequences of your actions. We are not meant to die. Kill us, and you will suffer a terrible fate."
"Fine, fine, you can have access to the station, just don't kill us."

event.text: You gain access to the station, and discover its basically just one big store.

event.name: FLEET_AEA_OLD_ELITE
event.text: A large scale battle has broken out in the sector. The ship that approaches is no regular outcast, but rather an Elite! With the chaos around you, you won't get very long to attack the ship uninterupted.

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the Elite.

event.name: FLEET_AEA_OLD_ELITE_ASB
event.text: A large scale battle has broken out in the sector. The ship that approaches is no regular outcast, but rather an Elite! You'll need to be careful as there are several ships around you joining taking pot shots at you and your opponent.

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the Elite.

event.name: FLEET_AEA_OLD_LYLMIK_OUT
event.text: The lylmik fleet has appeared to break up the conflict, a powerful Lylmik vessel approaches you, clearly intent on breaking you up in hundreds of pieces.

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the ship.

event.name: FLEET_AEA_OLD_LYLMIK_NOASB
event.text: The Lylmik fleet has arrived to your beacon on their way to the gate, A Lylmik ship approaches you with it's weapons out. Not seeing you as a threat, the rest of the fleet ignores you.

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the ship.

event.name: FLEET_AEA_OLD_LYLMIK
event.text: The Lylmik fleet has arrived to your beacon on their way to the gate, A Lylmik ship approaches you with it's weapons out.

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the ship.

event.name: FLEET_AEA_OLD_LYLMIK_ELITE
event.text: The Lylmik fleet has arrived to your beacon on their way to the gate, and a nearby ship turns to engage. The ship that approaches is no regular Lylmik, but rather an Elite!

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the Elite.
